name: money-maker-platform
description: Platform monetisasi online dengan multiple revenue streams

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd client && npm run build && vercel --prod
scripts.deploy:backend: git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy to Render' && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend

author: Money Maker Platform
